description:
Tendermint is looking for a Head of Community Management to lead and manage programs and initiatives to nurture and grow our developer community. Tendermint is a platform for young developers to program, build great blockchain, and develop entrepreneurial skills.

You will be responsible for building programs, initiatives and social strategy for our developer community. This includes communicating product updates, best practices and announcements from Tendermint with our developer community. You will also act as internal voice of developer - prioritizing and shepherding feedback from community back to product. An understanding of blockchain development and community management best practices is a must as you will own the communication with a very knowledgeable and vested community.
requirements: Experienced: 5-7 years of experience in developer community management, driving programs, and initiatives
Strong developer background: Has understanding of software development fundamentals and experience with community management of this audience
Extraverted: Enjoys communicating with 1000s of eager fans and young adults
Self-organized: with a desire to get things done
Excellent communicator: Both written and oral
Organized: Able to handle complicated situations diplomatically and remain levelheaded
Passionate: Desire to work on a dynamic team and a willingness to work on new projects.
tasks: **Nurture and Grow Community:**
Define and build programs to scale the growth and success of the community - actively looking to nurture developers from one level to the next
Maintain consistent Tendermint voice and use best practices for answering company inquiries
Be connected with the community, monitor communication channels
Set up metrics and drive reporting for community
Build personal relationships with community members, developers, and internal staff
**Manage Social Media and Other Communication Channels:**
Create a regular cadence of communications to the broader developer community through a combination of blogging, social media, Medium, and Youtube
Establish measurable metrics for success and improvement for each channel
Help establish analytical models to understand community requests and needs
title: Head of Community Management, Developer Relations

description:
Tendermint is a first-of-its kind Proof-of-Stake consensus engine in development since 2015. It is designed to provide developers maximum control in developing their own business logic in a blockchain setting, while relying on a secure consensus algorithm.

Weâ€™re looking for a motivated, experienced Javascript Engineer to work with backend blockchain engineers to develop web applications for novel blockchain applications.

Cosmos is a project by the core developers of tendermint to launch a highly-secure public blockchain on this technology. We have recently completed a fundraising round and are looking to rapidly expand, mainly centered around Berlin, Toronto, and San Francisco.

Under the umbrella of the cosmos system, we are building a number of custom blockchain apps for various usecases.  This position would first work on building some smaller applications to demonstrate and discover best practices with this platform, with the potential of later participating in developing the UI for the main comsos application.
requirements: Minimum 1 years experience in web engineering and Single-Page apps.
Strong experience with Vue (prefered), ReactJS or AngularJS
Experience with TDD and willingness to write tests
tasks: Develop intuitive web-based interfaces that expose blockchain applications
Work closely with backend engineers (in Berlin and remote)
Give feedback to refine the design of the REST-based API, as well as general functionality
Provide a basic UI/UX design to your applications
Work with a remote designer if needed to polish the applications
